content.text: Now I'll check if the remote branch is up to date and create the PR:

input.command:
gh pr create --base main --head feat-ui-foundation --title "feat(ui): Add UI foundation layer with design system and animation architecture" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

This PR establishes a comprehensive UI foundation layer for Socialaize with a complete design system, advanced animation architecture, and responsive utilities. This foundation enables consistent, accessible, and performant UI development across the entire application.

### Core Additions

**ðŸŽ¨ Design System (Tailwind v4 CSS-First)**
- 1300+ design tokens via CSS custom properties (`@theme` directive)
- Semantic color system with primary (teal), success, warning, error, info scales (50-950)
- Surface and text color hierarchies for light/dark modes
- Standardized shadow, spacing, typography, and border radius scales
- Z-index layering system for dropdowns, modals, tooltips, toasts

**ðŸŽ­ Animation Architecture**
- `useAnimation.ts` (2803 lines) - Universal animation orchestrator with timelines, scroll triggers, stagger, environment awareness
- `useAnimateElement.ts` (335 lines) - Simplified API with 13 built-in presets (fadeIn, slideUp, scaleUp, popIn, etc.)
- `useAnimationPresets.ts` (216 lines) - 7 advanced patterns (orbitingIcon, pulseLoop, typewriter, etc.)
- `src/constants/animations.ts` - Duration and easing constants synced with CSS
- Environment-aware performance (reduced motion, battery optimization, FPS monitoring)

**ðŸ› ï¸ Utility Systems**
- Glass morphism utilities (subtle/medium/strong/card/navbar/modal)
- Gradient utilities (hero, accent, CTA, mesh, text gradients)
- Focus ring variants (primary, error, success)
- Accessibility utilities (sr-only, skip-link, reduce-animations)
- Performance utilities (battery-optimize, performance-mode)
- Mobile utilities (touch-optimized, large-touch-targets)

**ðŸ“± Responsive Utilities**
- `useResponsiveContainer` composable for container queries
- Enhanced composables for code splitting, lazy loading, virtual scrolling

**ðŸŽ¯ Component Base Styles**
- Button, badge, card component foundations
- Form element base styles (inputs, checkboxes, radio buttons)
- Consistent component architecture patterns

### Files Changed (25 files, 5313+ additions)

**New Animation System:**
- `src/components/vue/animations/composables/useAnimation.ts` (2803 lines)
- `src/components/vue/animations/composables/useAnimateElement.ts` (335 lines)
- `src/components/vue/animations/composables/useAnimationPresets.ts` (215 lines)
- `src/components/vue/animations/composables/useAnimationState.ts` (157 lines)
- `src/components/vue/animations/composables/useAnimationEnvironment.ts` (214 lines)
- `src/components/vue/animations/composables/animationTokens.ts` (75 lines)
- `src/constants/animations.ts` (118 lines)

**Design System Files:**
- `src/styles/design-system.css` - Enhanced with CSS custom properties
- `src/styles/global.css` - 404+ additions with `@theme` directive
- `src/styles/components.css` - 263 lines of component base styles
- `src/styles/utilities.css` - 381 lines of utility classes
- `src/styles/typography.css` - 89 lines of typography utilities

**Responsive Utilities:**
- `src/components/composables/useResponsiveContainer.ts` (112 lines)

**Updated Imports (8 components):**
- Migrated to new animation composable locations
- FloatingPanel, PerformanceMonitoringDashboard, GroupedAccountSelector
- AnimatedFloatingElement, workflow components

**Configuration:**
- `tailwind.config.mjs` - Streamlined for Tailwind v4 CSS-first approach

### Technical Highlights

âœ… **CSS-First Approach** - Single source of truth via CSS custom properties  
âœ… **Dark Mode Support** - All colors and utilities support `dark:` variants via `[data-theme="dark"]`  
âœ… **SSR Safe** - Animation composables use `useMounted()` for SSR compatibility  
âœ… **Accessibility** - Reduced motion support, focus management, ARIA-friendly utilities  
âœ… **Performance** - Battery-aware animations, FPS monitoring, progressive degradation  
âœ… **Type Safety** - Full TypeScript integration throughout  

### Documentation

Comprehensive documentation added to `CLAUDE.md` with:
- Animation system decision tree (when to use which composable)
- Design system token reference (colors, shadows, typography)
- Component pattern examples (buttons, badges, cards, icons)
- SSR safety patterns
- File reference map

### Migration Notes

- **Tailwind v4** uses CSS `@theme` directive instead of JS config
- Animation composables relocated to `src/components/vue/animations/composables/`
- Import paths updated in affected components (8 files)
- All utilities designed to work alongside existing code (non-breaking)

### Next Steps

This foundation enables:
- ðŸŽ¨ Consistent component development with design tokens
- ðŸŽ­ Rich, accessible animations across the app
- ðŸ“± Responsive, mobile-first UI patterns
- â™¿ WCAG-compliant accessibility features
- âš¡ Performance-optimized user experiences

### Testing Checklist

- [x] Animation composables tested with presets
- [x] Design tokens validated in light/dark modes
- [x] Responsive utilities tested across breakpoints
- [x] SSR compatibility verified (no hydration mismatches)
- [x] Accessibility utilities validated
- [x] TypeScript compilation passes
- [x] No breaking changes to existing components

EOF
)"

content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully created the pull request. Here's the PR:

ðŸŽ‰ **Pull Request Created:** https://github.com/ZachHandley/socialaize/pull/60

**Title:** feat(ui): Add UI foundation layer with design system and animation architecture

**Summary:** The PR includes all 4 commits from your `feat-ui-foundation` branch:
1. `feat(ui): Add UI foundation layer - CSS design system, animation architecture, responsive utilities`
2. `fix: Add useAnimateElement and update imports to new animation structure`
3. `further enhancements`
4. `a few more best practices`

**Changes:** 25 files changed with 5,313 additions, including:
- Complete animation system with 3 composables (2803+ lines total)
- Design system with 1300+ CSS tokens
- Utility classes for glass morphism, gradients, accessibility
- Responsive utilities and component base styles
- Updated Tailwind v4 configuration

The PR description provides a comprehensive overview of the UI foundation layer, technical highlights, migration notes, and next steps. The branch is ready for review and merge into `main`.
